text: Andrew Hamilton (10 June 1882 – 20 July 1915) was a Scottish professional football forward who made one appearance in the Scottish League for Aberdeen. == Personal life == Hamilton served as a private in the Gordon Highlanders during the First World War and was killed in West Flanders, Belgium on 20 July 1915, having only arrived on the Western Front two months earlier.
